data.title: University of New Hampshire
data.meta_description: At the University of New Hampshire, research excellence, best-value education and leadership in sustainability mean Wildcats are poised to change the world.
data.meta_site_name: University of New Hampshire | University of New Hampshire
data.text:
UNH's new Hamel Honors & Scholars College is welcoming its inaugural class this fall. If you are the parent of a high-achieving student who wants to challenge themselves in college, this post is for you. Read on to learn more about the benefits of attending the Honors College at UNH and why it might be the right fit for your student.

read the guide

What does it mean to apply Early Action to college? Is it better to apply Early Action or Regular Decision? This blog post is here to explain the Early Action application deadline and to help you find the best admissions deadline for you.

read the guide

Summer of ’24 has already broken heat records here in New England, but some in our UNH community are staying cool. Here are five ways our ’Cats are beating the dog days of summer.
